amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that fees authorized in the bill to be collected shall be available to fund the operations of the Commission and the administration of the Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in part B of House Report 109-225 to clarify that fees authorized to be collected shall be available to fund the operations of the Commission and the administration of the Act; to clarify that offsetting collections are available to the Commission subject to appropriation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
